1.Sex - Gender of patient Male = 1, Female =0
2.Age - Age of patient
3.Diabetes - 0 = No, 1 = Yes
4.Anaemia - 0 = No, 1 = Yes
5.High_blood_pressure - 0 = No, 1 = Yes
6.Smoking - 0 = No, 1 = Yes
7.DEATH_EVENT - 0 = No, 1 = Yes
